short_summary: An ACAN is a public notice indicating to the supplier community that a department or agency intends to award a contract for goods, services or construction to a pre-identified supplier. Suppliers can submit a Statement of Capabilities to bid.
description: An ACAN is a public notice indicating to the supplier community that a department or agency intends to award a contract for goods, services or construction to a pre-identified supplier, thereby allowing other suppliers to signal their interest in bidding, by submitting a statement of capabilities. If no supplier submits a statement of capabilities that meets the requirements set out in the ACAN, on or before the closing date stated in the ACAN, the contracting officer may then proceed with the award to the pre-identified supplier.", “related_materials_url”: “https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/37410/transport-canada---t8080-230628-acan.pdf”, “deadline”: “2024-05-17T15:00:00”, “related UNSPSC Categories are *Motor vehicles \\n*Database information retrieval \\n*Public order and safety", “unspsc_description”: “Motor vehicles, Database information retrieval, Public order and safety”
tags: Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership
Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement
World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement
full_summary:
================

### Title
ACAN - SAE Standards Database

### Reference
Reference Number: cb-253-42769918
Amendment Number: 1
Solicitation Number: T8080-230628

### Publishing Details
Publication Date: May 2, 2024
Publication Method: Advance Contract Award Notice (ACAN)

### Notice Details
Notice Type: Advance Contract Award Notice
Procurement Category: Service
Trade Agreements: Please refer to attached documents T8080-230628-ACAN.pdf and the Buyandsell.gc.ca website for the list of trade agreements.

### Scope
Transport Canada invites Statements of Capabilities from interested suppliers who can provide a SAE Standards Database for an ACAN-identified supplier.

### Closing Date
Tender Closing Date: May 17, 2024, 15:00:00

### Attachment
Tender documents, including the ACAN and contract requirements, can be found at the following URL:
https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/37410/transport-canada---t8080-230628-acan.pdf

### Attention
Cory Lajoie, at (204) 228-2267 or cory.lajoie@tc.gc.ca, with any questions, but no further information regarding deadlines for contacting, submissions, or other information for participants than has been identified in the previous segment.

### Contact Information
Cory Lajoie
cory.lajoie@tc.gc.ca (preferably)
(204) 228-2267 (phone)
-- (no fax number given in provided word document version of sharing from contractor)
Transport Canada
344 Edmonton St.
Winnipeg
Manitoba R3B 2L4 Canada

### Notice
An advance notice of the upcoming opportunity, a contract for the ACAN, indicating an intention to award to an expected participant. If so no other participants respond timely, contracting forward to award to an expected participant.

### Details
Statement of Capabilities must be submitted in writing (preferably e-mail), and must clearly show how the supplier fits with overall project described in the discussion available for download on the next posting.
